attributes.action: Cancel all exams in 2021 for all types (btecs, atecs etc)
attributes.additional_details:
Schools are shut because it’s deemed unsafe to be there yet you will happily allow some students to sit in a hall and take an exam and be with others. A levels and as levels and GCSEs have been cancelled due to the disruption yet students that do Btecs,Atecs etc have to take them.Most courses are still unsure what’s happening so students are still in the blue with what’s going on 
Are we doing them or not ? Why should collages get to choose when a level ones didn’t make it a level playing field
attributes.background: Take the Authority and cancel any exams due to take place in 2021 both theory and practical

rejection.details:
Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615

Decisions about courses and assessments that are delivered by independent educational institutions, as opposed to state schools, are a matter for individual exam boards and educational institutions, not the Government or House of Commons.
